attributes.action: The government will have 30 days to prepare a solution to ending tier systems
attributes.additional_details: The government have failed in their promise to protect jobs as they said they would in March, that the restrictions were to 'flatten the curve' and that we would be back to a normal life within weeks. It has been nearly 12 months and the situation is as dire now as it was then, so its time to change leadership.
attributes.background: The government need to protect British jobs and the mental health of vulnerable people who have yet again been placed on furlough. We demand a general election if they cannot prepare a solution in 30 days from the 14th January
